summary: Ruza left Belgrade for Switzerland as a young woman full of hope for a new and better life. Twentyfive years later she appears to have achieved everything: She owns a canteen in Zurich, ... See full summary »
cast: Mirjana Karanovic|Marija Skaricic|Ljubica Jovic|Andrea Zogg|Pablo Aguilar|Zdenko Jelcic|David Imhoof|Sebastian Krähenbühl|Oliver Zgorelec|Annette Wunsch|Kenneth Huber|Anikó Donáth|Hans Suter|Stefan Suske|Vera Bommer|Robin Rehmann|Tiziana Jelmini|Thomas Matter|Nenad Milic|Peter Petrovic|Sanja Ristic
title: Das Fräulein
